HomePage.aboutP1: 48hub is the official alumni verification platform, providing authentication and credibility for graduates. We maintain a centralized registry of verified alumni and their achievements.
HomePage.aboutP2: Our platform connects to KFOKAM48 (K48), the first intensive developer training school in Cameroon. K48 offers completely free education based on peer-to-peer learning, inspired by École 42.
HomePage.aboutP3: We showcase verified projects, track career evolution, and provide proof-of-training via unique matricule numbers. Our mission: establish credibility and visibility for African tech talent.
HomePage.about48hub: 48hub serves as the verification portal and alumni registry for KFOKAM48 graduates, providing proof-of-training and career showcase capabilities.
